```{r}
library(targets)
tar_load(
  c(
    penguins_modelling,
    penguins_glm,
    augmented_penguins,
    penguins_prediction_grid
  )
)
```

# Explore models

```{r}
ggplot(augmented_penguins,
       aes(x = bill_length_mm,
           y = .fitted)) + 
  geom_point()

ggplot(augmented_penguins,
       aes(x = bill_length_mm,
           y = bill_depth_mm,
           colour = .fitted)) + 
  geom_point()
```

Can we make this a grid?...

```{r}
ggplot(penguins_prediction_grid,
       aes(x = bill_depth_mm,
           y = bill_length_mm,
           fill = .fitted)) + 
  geom_tile() + 
  scale_fill_continuous_sequential()
```
